data.title: Una Storia Moderna (L’Ape Regina)
data.text:
Le lit conjugal

Directed byMarco Ferreri

Films

Una Storia Moderna (L’Ape Regina)

Le lit conjugal

Directed byMarco Ferreri, starringUgo Tognazzi, Marina Vlady, Walter Giller

ORIGINAL LANGUAGE IT

SUBTITLES FR

COUNTRY Italie, France

Duration 93

Prices 9.00 €, 7.00 €, 6.50 €, 6.00 €

Moderator ticket Article 27, Arsène 50

Abonnement Carte 5 places, UGC Unlimited

Synopsis

A hardened bachelor, Alfonso, 40, marries Regina, a young Catholic woman. Still a virgin, Regina soon proves to be sexually insatiable. She wants to be impregnated as quickly as possible, even if it means endangering her husband's life, who is no more than a simple way of reproduction for her.

Films

Synopsis

A hardened bachelor, Alfonso, 40, marries Regina, a young Catholic woman. Still a virgin, Regina soon proves to be sexually insatiable. She wants to be impregnated as quickly as possible, even if it means endangering her husband's life, who is no more than a simple way of reproduction for her.

As part of the event

The Brussels International Film Festival (BRIFF), will take place from 23rd June to 2nd July in the heart of Brussels for its 5th edition! This year again, the BRIFF promises you a concentrate of strong images and emotions on the big screen.
